verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1.Jesus Christ is risen today,Aleluia
Our triumphant holy day,Aleluia

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who did once upon the cross,Aleluia
suffer to redeem our loss,aleluia

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2.Hymns of praise then let us sing,Aleluia
Unto Christ our heavenly king,Aleluia

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Who endured the cross and grave,Aleluia
sinners to redeem and save,Aleluia

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
3.But the pain that He endured,Aleluia
now above the sky,He is king,Aleluia
Where the angels ever sing.Aleluia
